flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: The Students at Brandeis Hillel Day School in San Rafael, California made this Sukkah using 421 Milk Jugs.  Sukkot is a Jewish harvest holiday where Sukkah's are used for 8 days.  A Sukkah is a temporary shelter and helps people connect with nature.  This
guide.title: Milk Jug Sukkah
